Text:
For more great poetry, see my upload of Staying Alive:

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8291980
This is great -- I attended one of Milosz's readings years ago and walked away with a couple of signed first editions.  Great memories.  Thank you for reviving them!
@penfag - Now that makes me envious. But I'm glad I'm not the only Milosz fan here.

The poster points out that this commie won a "Nobel Prize".Balack Osama won one too.What did he win for???I forget??
Oh yeah,he won because it's a fake,meaningless award given to any monkey who can put on a suit.
